person.persName: Charles O. P. Smith (Adair County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Adair County native. Married to Sarah Cabell Smith in Adair County on July 14, 1838. Father of John W. Smith, Mary E. Smith, George W. Smith, and Andrew J. Smith. Married to Melissa Ann Gifford Smith in Adair County on April 21, 1858. Father of Susan C. Smith. Blacksmith in White County, Illinois, in 1850. Blacksmith in Adair County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from April 17, 1863, to January 10, 1865.
